fields.label: Flexible Content
fields.name: flexible_content
fields.instructions: Add flexible content layouts to build your page

sub_fields.label: Include Image Headers on Custom Content
sub_fields.name: include_image_headers_on_custom_content

sub_fields.label: Content Blocks
sub_fields.name: content_blocks
sub_fields.instructions: These will always display in two columns (max) rows. No limit on number of Content Blocks. If odd number of items, center last one.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Optional - search and pick from icon library

sub_fields.label: Gallery
sub_fields.name: gallery
sub_fields.instructions: Select one Gallery from Gallery CPT

sub_fields.label: Floor Plans
sub_fields.name: floor_plans
sub_fields.instructions: Manual select as many needed; OR choose a Community Floor Plan category. Allow for Searching by name and Filtering by Community Floor Plan Category.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Search and pick from icon library

sub_fields.label: Form Position
sub_fields.name: form_position
sub_fields.instructions: If position=center, zone is one column. If position is left or right, zone is two column.

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: icon
sub_fields.instructions: Search and pick from icon library

sub_fields.label: Accordions
sub_fields.name: accordions
sub_fields.instructions: Select multiple individual Accordions posts OR select an Accordion Category below

sub_fields.label: Accordion Category
sub_fields.name: accordion_category
sub_fields.instructions: Alternatively, select a single Accordion Category to display all accordions from that category
